promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a young simple boar grass-type pokemon wearing regal armor. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or boar. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Verdarmor, a a young simple boar grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Boo-Hoo, Present. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "boar", "grass" or "Verdarmor". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, boar-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, green and orange ambient lighting
generatedDescription: Found in lush, wild terrains, this young pokemon, Verdarmor, uses its Boo-Hoo ability to startle predators. It loves gifting fruits with Present.
